name: Personal Space(ship)
description:
A fast-paced tower defense game where your quick reflexes and on the spot decision making are just as important as long term strategy and resource management.

To play: download & extract zip file, open file named "Isolation Game Jam"

Have a go at endless mode for hours of fun, where the unpredictability of what's around the corner might just be the most intense part, experience a fun little story about the origins of the game in story mode, or try one of the special game modes that are as unique as anything.

Play for the highest score or just have fun! (My personal best is 5846)

The game includes a variety of enemies and bosses, each with unique behaviors, upgrades, 5 different towers, abilities and more!

The game comes with built-in instructions, but as a quick overview here: You must keep enemies and your own towers outside of the robots personal space (the white circle surrounding it) by shooting enemies and placing towers. Shoot with left click, purchase items and click buttons with right click.

In endless mode and waves mode, special events can occur after fixed amounts of time. It is more fun if you experience them with no prior knowledge to what they do (this makes the game more unpredictable and wild) but if you must know what they are:

Bug Attack - several quick bug (electronic) enemies travel from the left side of the screen. These will always take two shots to destroy but can be destroyed by colliding with a tower. They are not affected by the vibe.

Overclocked - the game speeds up for around 15 seconds by 2 times.

Malware - anywhere from 3 to 5 of your existing towers are destroyed

Trojan Horses - 3 Trojan horses travel from the right side of the screen. They have a lot of health and destroy towers with little to no effort.

DDOS attack - your screen becomes littered with tabs for around 15 seconds, making it very difficult to see.

In addition to these events, at fixed intervals the game will speed up, making it increasingly harder to react to all the incoming enemies.
